statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.55}+{5.25}\right)}={23.6}\approx{23.6}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.25}\cdot{5.67}={29.7675}\approx{29.8}.
